response.original_title: Mrs William Horsley Presents: The Pencil of Nature
response.overview: "Frugal Folk Television" VHS release from 2019 Mrs William Horsley Studios bring you a 40 minute programme of Entertainment, Experiment, Nature and Artifice. 1. Mars Envoy's Missive to Home Planet (Optical Poem) 2. The Pencil of Nature (Botanical Identification) 3. Graveyard Mysteries (With Carlos Gonzalez, Ezra San-Millan, MT Shelves) 4. Woke Animalcules (With Mollie Goldstrom) 5. Swirl Therapy (With Jack Reese) 6. Amphibian's Recital (With Brendan Fay) All edits made in-camera or additively Â© 2019 M.T. Shelves / Mrs William Horsley
response.title: Mrs William Horsley Presents: The Pencil of Nature
